entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
